title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7002.8 - Admissions telephone call
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7002.8 - Admissions telephone call

State Regulations

Consistent with the provisions of Part 7031 of this

Subtitle, a prisoner shall be permitted to make telephone calls upon admission
to a facility. Prisoners shall be informed upon admission of their rights to
make such telephone calls. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
7002.8

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
